channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 25 – Las Vegas NV To Merced CA
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Yeah, that's what National roadside assistance said. I still don't like it, though. Anyway, I don't plan to move the car much in San Francisco, so I might skip the visit to the service center.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, that’s what National roadside assistance said. I still don’t like it, though. Anyway, I don’t plan to move the car much in San Francisco, so I might skip the visit to the service center.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: 'maintenance required' light is nothing -- it turns on automaticaly after a certain number of miles. That is , you won't get stuck because of it...
item.content:encoded: ‘maintenance required’ light is nothing — it turns on automaticaly after a certain number of miles. That is , you won’t get stuck because of it…
